a wall is a damagable event.
u can build or breakdown walls.
u can even build onto this wall.
techinally u can wall off ur entire side of the board.
if you destory it. the opponents lawyer records
ur violation, and it can be used when a case
is made against u and u can be forced 2 pay a fine
(costs money 2 make case , lawyer pockets money
plus is on retainer, expensive peice. but u can
make a shit tone of money suing the opponent if they have
alot of violations and haven't killed ur lawyer)
//in a way lawyers are like the keepers of the fence(law)
